mapper.select: SELECT b.board_id , b.board_nm , b.created_at , m1.nickname as created_by_nm , b.updated_at , m2.nickname as updated_by_nm , role_id FROM board b LEFT OUTER JOIN member m1 ON b.created_by = m1.member_id LEFT OUTER JOIN member m2 ON b.updated_by = m2.member_id WHERE role_id in (#{roleId}, 3) /* 3 == BOTH */
